thread.title: Silver n Copper for now
thread.title_full: APMEX reviewed by Silver n Copper for now

author: Silver n Copper for now
title: Silver n Copper for now
text:
Just getting into online buying .. found APMEX site to be most user friendly and easy set up for wish list .. buying some coins for gifts ,, kids in the family .
Second order with AMPEX , hope to do more later and buy larger amounts bullion trade units . Liked APMEX selection in all areas of precious metal .
New to most of this , understand , from what read and what APMEX , has data on , that I don't want to collect , so best route for me is to deal in bullion units. watch prices in days , weeks , months , years , ahead , try buy low in sell high .
O , coins received as kids now say , Really POPPED , minted features very fine , and I am very pleased .
